text: 'inma hrram allah ealaykum almaytat min alhywan, waldam almsfwh min aldhbyh eind dhbhh, walahm alkhnzyr, wama dhubih lighayr allh, lkn man aljath darurat alkhawf min almawt 'iilaa 'akl shay' min hadhih almhrmat wahu ghyr zalm, wala mtjawz hdd aldrwrt, fa'iina allah ghafur lh, rahim bh, la yeaqbh ealaa ma fel
